other_tests.findings: 1- to 2-mm ST-segment depressions in leads I, aVL, and V3 through V6.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The S4 had been present since her previous event.

other_tests.findings: 99% occlusion of the left circumflex artery (LCx); 40% proximal focal stenosis in the right coronary artery; patent prior stent in LCx distal to 3 serial 90% stenoses.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Unchanged appearance of the proximal LCx stenoses; 40% proximal right coronary artery stenosis was again present and unchanged on follow-up.

other_tests.findings: Multiple homogeneous concentric stenoses in the proximal LCx with hyperreflective, thickened intima and isolated areas of hypoattenuation.
Resting perfusion defect in the basal to mid inferior and inferolateral walls, matching regions of hypokinesis, without evidence of late gadolinium enhancement.
Did not reveal any evidence of large-vessel vasculitis.
Patent LCx stents without evidence of restenosis or new inflammatory disease.
